subject: Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The British sprinter Dwain Chambers says he wants to take part in the 2012 London Games despite being suspended from the Olympics for life by the British Olympic Association after testing positive for the banned drug THG.
snippet: The British sprinter Dwain Chambers says he wants to take part in the 2012 London Games despite being suspended from the Olympics for life by the British Olympic Association after testing positive for the banned drug THG.
